Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

WVPlots 1.0.0 2018-05-24 Unreleased

  • Added hexbin plot
  • Prepare for next ggplot2 version
  • Added shadow plot.
  • Improve argument checking.
  • Add frame narrowing.
  • Make significance tests user selectable.
  • Clean up F-test in ScatterHist.

WVPlots 0.3.2 2018-05-07 2018-05-08

  • Remove RSQLite dependence.
  • Report F-test on linear fit in more cases in ScatterHist.

WVPlots 0.3.1 2018-04-03 2018-04-03

  • Remove R version dependence.
  • Speed up gain curve.
  • Make heavy weight packages suggested.

WVPlots 0.3.0 2018-03-20 2018-03-20

  • Make dependencies more flexible.
  • Remove replyr dependency.
  • Stop re-exporting wrapr functions.

WVPlots 0.2.9 2018-03-13 2018-03-13

  • Add LogLogPlot.
  • Lower dependencies.

WVPlots 0.2.8 2018-01-20 2018-01-20

  • Add new performance plot.
  • Switch to new cdata signatures.

WVPlots 0.2.7 2017-11-28 2017-11-28

  • Fix documentation fixes.
  • Switch from reshape2 to cdata.
  • Move to wrapr 1.0.2.

WVPlots 0.2.6 2017-08-28 2017-08-29

  • Fix plotly labels.

WVPlots 0.2.5 2017-07-04 2017-07-04

  • Minor documentation fixes.

WVPlots 0.2.4 2017-05-05 2017-05-05

  • More argument checking.
  • NA guard on ScatterHist.
  • plotly ROC.

WVPlots 0.2.3 2017-03-24 2017-03-24

  • Fix right-plot alignment in ScatterHist
  • Expose ROC data structures

WVPlots 0.2.2 2017-02-17 2017-02-17

  • Move debug to wrapr https://github.com/WinVector/wrapr

WVPlots 0.2.1 2017-01-17 Unreleased

  • Fix warnings.
  • Improve Imports/Depends/Suggests.
  • Fix smoothing bug in BinaryYScatterPlot.

WVPlots 0.2.0 2017-01-15 2017-01-17

  • First CRAN submission.
